articles.author: Sumita Layek
articles.title: PRECIOUS-Gold prices rise slightly on soft dollar
articles.description:
Trump
    * Gold prices could test $1,540/oz next - analyst

    By Sumita Layek
    Jan 2 (Reuters) - Gold prices edged higher on Thursday as
the dollar hovered near a six-month low hit on New Year's Eve
amid bets U.S. economic outperformance could be coming…

articles.author: Jane Chung
articles.title: Oil rises supported by U.S.-China trade optimism, Middle East tensions
articles.description: Oil prices rose on the first trading day of 2020 as warming trade relations between the United States and China eased demand concerns, and rising tensions in the Middle East raised worries about supply.
articles.content:
SEOUL (Reuters) - Oil prices rose on the first trading day of 2020 as warming trade relations between the United States and China eased demand concerns, and rising tensions in the Middle East raised worries about supply. 
Global benchmark Brent crude futures… [+2274 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Treasury's Mnuchin to head U.S. delegation to Davos conclave
articles.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin will lead a group of U.S. officials who will attend the World Economic Forum later this month in Davos, Switzerland, the White House said Wednesday.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin will lead a group of U.S. officials who will attend the World Economic Forum later this month in Davos, Switzerland, the White House said Wednesday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Indian shares track Asian markets higher, metal stocks shine
articles.description: Indian shares rose on Thursday, in line with Asian markets, as investors cheered Beijing's monetary policy easing decision and upbeat cues on the Sino-U.S. trade deal front.
articles.content:
BENGALURU (Reuters) - Indian shares rose on Thursday, in line with Asian markets, as investors cheered Beijing’s monetary policy easing decision and upbeat cues on the Sino-U.S. trade deal front. 
The NSE Nifty 50 index rose 0.3% to 12,219.25 by 0410 GMT on … [+1276 chars]

articles.author: Wayne Cole
articles.title: Dollar off to a flat start for 2020 as others find the fizz
articles.description: The dollar started the new year where it left the old one, on the back foot as investors wagered U.S. economic outperformance might be drawing to a close as optimism on trade brightens the outlook for growth globally.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - The dollar started the new year where it left the old one, on the back foot as investors wagered U.S. economic outperformance might be drawing to a close as optimism on trade brightens the outlook for growth globally.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Don Larsen, who pitched perfect World Series game, dies at 90
articles.description: Don Larsen, who pitched the only perfect game in World Series history for the New York Yankees in 1956, died Wednesday, his agent said. He was 90 years old.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Don Larsen, who pitched the only perfect game in World Series history for the New York Yankees in 1956, died Wednesday, his agent said. He was 90 years old. 
Larsen died of esophageal cancer in Hayden, Idaho, Andrew Levy, who represented the pitc… [+527 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Barrett
articles.title: Australia's temperate mountains evacuated as bushfires approach
articles.description: Hundreds of residents and holiday-makers have been ordered to evacuate Australia's temperate Snowy Mountains region in the state of New South Wales as fierce fires threaten from two sides, authorities said on Thursday.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Hundreds of residents and holiday-makers have been ordered to evacuate Australia’s temperate Snowy Mountains region in the state of New South Wales as fierce fires threaten from two sides, authorities said on Thursday.

articles.author: Shruti Sonal
articles.title: SE Asia Stocks-Philippines falls over 2%; most others start new year on positive note
articles.description:
Philippine shares slumped over 2% to their
lowest in about two weeks on utilities and industrials, while
most other Southeast Asian stock markets started the new year in
the green amid Sino-U.S. trade deal progress.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Thai Dec inflation quickens to 0.87%, slightly below forecast
articles.description: Thailand's consumer price index (CPI) rose 0.87% in December from a year earlier, quickening from the previous month but slightly below expectations, commerce ministry data showed on Thursday.
articles.content:
BANGKOK, Jan 2 (Reuters) - Thailand’s consumer price index (CPI) rose 0.87% in December from a year earlier, quickening from the previous month but slightly below expectations, commerce ministry data showed on Thursday.

articles.title: Gaming firm Razer joins Singapore digital bank race
articles.description: Gaming firm Razer Inc said on Thursday it is leading a consortium of companies that has applied for a online bank licence in Singapore, joining the race to shake up the city state's financial sector.
articles.content:
